LanguageData.WarframeJumpGizmo.name: Warframe Jump
LanguageData.ExcaliburSkill1.name: Slash Dash
LanguageData.ExcaliburSkill1.desc: Dash between enemies while slashing with the Exalted Blade.
LanguageData.ExcaliburSkill2.name: Radial Blind
LanguageData.ExcaliburSkill2.desc: Emits a bright flash of light, blinding all enemies in a small radius for several seconds.
LanguageData.ExcaliburSkill3.name: Radial Javelin
LanguageData.ExcaliburSkill3.desc: Launches javelins towards enemies, dealing high damage and impaling them to walls.
LanguageData.ExcaliburSkill4.name: Exalted Blade
LanguageData.ExcaliburSkill4.desc: Summon a sword of pure light and immense power.
LanguageData.MagSkill1.name: Pull
LanguageData.MagSkill1.desc: Magnetic force pulls enemies toward you, stunning them and bringing them into melee range.
LanguageData.MagSkill2.name: Magnetize
LanguageData.MagSkill2.desc: Creates a magnetic field around a target, ensnaring nearby enemies and dealing damage over time. The field reacts to bullets and shards created from Polarize to increase the damage.
LanguageData.MagSkill3.name: Polarize
LanguageData.MagSkill3.desc: Emit an energy pulse that depletes enemy shields and armor, creating shards which become deadly when mixed with Magnetize. Shields of allies touched by the pulse are restored.
LanguageData.MagSkill4.name: Crush
LanguageData.MagSkill4.desc: Magnetizes the bones of nearby enemies, causing them to collapse upon themselves.
LanguageData.VoltSkill1.name: Shock
LanguageData.VoltSkill1.desc: Launches a shocking projectile. It stuns and deals high damage to a single target and chains damage to nearby enemies.
LanguageData.VoltSkill2.name: Speed
LanguageData.VoltSkill2.desc: Gain a brief boost of movement speed which affects all allies in range.
LanguageData.VoltSkill3.name: Electric Shield
LanguageData.VoltSkill3.desc: Volt deploys an obstacle of energy, providing cover in any situation.
LanguageData.VoltSkill4.name: Discharge
LanguageData.VoltSkill4.desc: Paralyze nearby hostiles with a damaging electric charge, this also shocks approaching enemies.
